sentences.en: Celebrity chefs slice, steam and sear in aspirational culinary shrines of stainless steel and high gloss.
sentences.cn: 名厨们在他们所渴望的布满不锈钢的高光泽的烹饪圣殿中切 、 蒸、烧.

sentences.en: Celebrity chefs slice, steam sear in aspirational culinary shrines of stainless steel and high gloss.
sentences.cn: 名厨们在他们所渴望的布满不锈钢的高光泽的烹调圣殿中切 、 蒸、烧.

sentences.en: Do you think just paying money entitles you to sear a man's flesh?
sentences.cn: 你以为只要出了钱就可以把别人的身体用花炮乱烧 吗 ?

sentences.en: Grass fires have seared the land near the farming village of Basekhai.
sentences.cn: 草地野火烧焦了巴斯克亥农庄附近的土地。

sentences.en: Heat 2 tbsps of oil to pan sear both sides of fish until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 锅中加热2汤匙油,快速放入鱼柳,把鱼柳两面都煎至金黄.

sentences.en: Heat a large skillet and sear the beef.
sentences.cn: 烧热平底锅,将牛肉表面略煎.

sentences.en: I distinctly felt the heat start to sear my throat.
sentences.cn: 我分明感觉到嗓子开始烧得难受。

sentences.en: It'seemed that he began to sear.
sentences.cn: 看来他开始变得无情了.

sentences.en: Of wailing winds and naked woods and meadows and sear.
sentences.cn: 风在哀号,树木凋零,草地一片枯黄.

sentences.en: Pan sear steak, fry until both sides Remove and cut into pieces.
sentences.cn: 平底锅中放少许油,烧热后放下牛排, 大火煎黄表面,两面都煎黄后夹出,切成块.

sentences.en: Pan sear the steak with oil to own preference, set aside and cut into thin slices.
sentences.cn: 将调味好的牛肉煎至各人喜爱熟度.取出牛肉放置一边,切成片.

sentences.en: Sear a wound to prevent infection.
Season beef ribs with seasonings, leave for 5 minutes. Pan sear ribs, arrange top of onion.
sentences.cn: 牛小排撒上调味料, 放置5分钟, 用热油煎黄两面, 移放在洋?丝上.

sentences.en: Season scallops with salt and pepper and sear pan till golden brown on both sides.
sentences.cn: 将扇贝以盐和白胡椒粉调味后煎至两面金黄色.

sentences.en: Some of the particles clog my smaller passages and some actually sear my tissues.
sentences.cn: 有些微粒堵塞我的小气道,有些甚至使我的组织凋萎.
高温灼伤了他们的皮肤。

sentences.en: To scorch or sear with heat.
sentences.cn: 使烤焦用热能烤焦或烧灼.

trans.tran_en: to burn something with a sudden powerful heat
